verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> drew <S%G2258>near<s%> <S%G1448><s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> for to <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G1234>murmured,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> This <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G4327>receiveth<s%> <S%G268>sinners,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> eateth <S%G4906>with<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036>spake<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> <S%G2532>if<s%> he <S%G622>lose<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> doth <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2641>leave<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> ninety and <S%G1768>nine<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1909>after<s%> that which is <S%G622>lost,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> he <S%G2147>find<s%> it? <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when he hath <S%G2147>found<s%> it, he <S%G2007>layeth<s%> it <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G5606>shoulders,<s%> rejoicing. <S%G5463><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G3624>home,<s%> he calleth <S%G4779>together<s%> his <S%G5384>friends<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1069>neighbors,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Rejoice <S%G4796>with<s%> <S%G3427>me;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> I have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> which was lost. <S%G622><s%>

I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3779>likewise<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G268>sinner<s%> that <S%G3340>repenteth,<s%> more <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> ninety and <S%G1768>nine<s%> just <S%G1342>persons,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

Either <S%G2228><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> pieces of <S%G1406>silver,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> she <S%G622>lose<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G1406>piece,<s%> doth <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G681>light<s%> a <S%G3088>candle,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4563>sweep<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G1960>diligently<s%> till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3775><s%> she <S%G2147>find<s%> it?

And <S%G2532><s%> when she hath <S%G2147>found<s%> it, she calleth her friends and her neighbors together, <S%G4779><s%> <S%G5384><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1069><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Rejoice <S%G4796>with<s%> <S%G3427>me;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> I have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1406>piece<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I had lost. <S%G622><s%>

Likewise, <S%G3779><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> there <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G268>sinner<s%> that repenteth. <S%G3340><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> sons: <S%G5207><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3501>younger<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to his <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3313>portion<s%> of <S%G3776>goods<s%> that <S%G1911>falleth<s%> to me. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1244>divided<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> his living. <S%G979><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3501>younger<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> gathered all together, <S%G4863><s%> <S%G537><s%> and took his <S%G589>journey<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3117>far<s%> <S%G5561>country,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G1287>wasted<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3776>substance<s%> with <S%G811>riotous<s%> living. <S%G2198><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G1159>spent<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G2478>mighty<s%> <S%G3042>famine<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5561>land;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to be in want. <S%G5302><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G2853>joined<s%> himself to <S%G1520>a<s%> <S%G4177>citizen<s%> of <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5561>country;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G68>fields<s%> to <S%G1006>feed<s%> swine. <S%G5519><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he would <S%G1937>fain<s%> have <S%G1072>filled<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2836>belly<s%> <S%G575>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2769>husks<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5519>swine<s%> did eat: <S%G2068><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> unto him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> How <S%G4214>many<s%> hired <S%G3407>servants<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>father's<s%> have bread enough and to spare, <S%G4052><s%> <S%G740><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%> with hunger! <S%G3042><s%>

I will <S%G450>arise<s%> and <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G2046>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> I have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> thee, <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to be <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> son: <S%G5207><s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> hired servants. <S%G3407><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G3962>father.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was yet a great way off, <S%G568><s%> <S%G2089><s%> <S%G3112><s%> his <S%G846><s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G4697>compassion,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5143>ran,<s%> and <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5137>neck,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2705>kissed<s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> I have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in thy sight, <S%G1799><s%> <S%G4675><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to be <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> son. <S%G5207><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants,<s%> Bring <S%G1627>forth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>best<s%> <S%G4749>robe,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> put it <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>put<s%> a <S%G1146>ring<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5266>shoes<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> his feet: <S%G4228><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> bring <S%G5342>hither<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4618>fatted<s%> <S%G3448>calf,<s%> and <S%G2380>kill<s%> it; <S%G2532>and<s%> let us <S%G5315>eat,<s%> and be merry: <S%G2165><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is alive <S%G326>again;<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G622>lost,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is <S%G2147>found.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G756>began<s%> to be merry. <S%G2165><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4245>elder<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the field: <S%G68><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> and drew <S%G1448>nigh<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G4858>music<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> dancing. <S%G5525><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3816>servants,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4441>asked<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> meant. <S%G1498><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4675>Thy<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> is <S%G2240>come;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> hath <S%G2380>killed<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4618>fatted<s%> <S%G3448>calf,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he hath <S%G618>received<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> safe and sound. <S%G5198><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he was <S%G3710>angry,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> go in: <S%G1525><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> came his father out, <S%G1831><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3870>entreated<s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to his <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2400>Lo,<s%> these <S%G5118>many<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> do I <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G4671>thee,<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3928>transgressed<s%> I at any <S%G3763>time<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> commandment: <S%G1785><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> yet thou <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G1325>gavest<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> a <S%G2056>kid,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I might make <S%G2165>merry<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> friends: <S%G5384><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> as soon <S%G3753>as<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> was <S%G2064>come,<s%> which hath <S%G2719>devoured<s%> thy <S%G979>living<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4204>harlots,<s%> thou hast <S%G2380>killed<s%> for <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4618>fatted<s%> calf. <S%G3448><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5043>Son,<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3842>ever<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that I <S%G1699>have<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> thine. <S%G4674><s%>

It <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G1163>meet<s%> that we should make <S%G2165>merry,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be glad: <S%G5463><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is alive <S%G326>again;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G622>lost,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is found. <S%G2147><s%>
